breach_of_fairness: relying on a departmental reply without allowing cross-examination of all its authors
natural_justice_principles: right to cross-examine witnesses when their testimony is crucial
decision_reasoning: contradicted earlier testimonies, raising fairness concerns
review_process: Judicial review under s. 18.1(4) of the Federal Court Act
decision_conclusion: The Appeal Board erred in not allowing cross-examination of all four authors
result_details: The application was allowed, and the case was sent back to the Appeal Board for further consideration
